entities.name: lord voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist of the story, mentioned by Dumbledore as someone who was refused the Defence Against the Dark Arts job.

relationships.description: Harry and Dumbledore are having a conversation, with Harry asking questions and Dumbledore providing answers.
Dumbledore tells Harry that he needs to retrieve a memory from Professor Slughorn in order to understand everything.
Dumbledore refused the Defence Against the Dark Arts job to Lord Voldemort, which is mentioned as a reason why they have never been able to keep a teacher for longer than a year.
